mapper.update: UPDATE reserve SET cnt=#{cnt}, price=#{price} WHERE reserveno = #{reserveno}
mapper.select: select o.orderlistno, o.orderdate, m.menuname, mi.menuimg, m.menuprice, s.storename, (r.cnt * m.menuprice) AS orderprice, o.reservedate, o.reservetime from reserve r inner join orderlist o on o.orderlistno = r.orderlistno inner join menu m on m.menuid = r.menuid inner join menuimgs mi on mi.menuid = m.menuid inner join store s on m.storeid = s.storeid where o.orderlistno = #{orderlistno};
